amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit funding for the "Drug Interdiction and Counter-Drug Activities, Defense" account by reducing the appropriation by $160,000,000.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in Part A of House Report 111-233 to prohibit funding for the `Drug Interdiction and Counter-Drug Activities, Defense' account by $160,000,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Flake amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 48 - 373 (Roll no. 662).
